overview: Recorded Live at Sport Campus Lange Munte, Kortrijk, Belgium  Tracklist:  Alpha – Anteludium  Abyss of Time – Countdown to Singularity  Freedom – The Wolves Within  Victims of Contingency  Storm the Sorrow  Unchain Utopia  Kingdom of Heaven Part 3 – The Antediluvian Universe  The Skeleton Key  Omega – Sovereign of the Sun Spheres  The Obsessive Devotion  Beyond the Matrix  Design Your Universe
title: Epica: Alcatraz Festival
